Class GenericSceneController

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.gui.scenesControllers.GenericSceneController
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameSceneController, LoginSceneController, SetupSceneController
public class GenericSceneController extends Object
Generic controller class for scenes in the application.
